Minibase is a hidden gem that hides on a quiet street in Zhongshan District.The bar has a dark underground bar atmosphere, exuding exquisite and unique atmosphere.Although the atmosphere is furious, the inside of the bar is full of vitality and vitality due to friendly local customers.Although we are foreigners, the staff is very enthusiastic and patient with us, so that we have the feeling of guests.The menu is written in English. It is convenient for us to order, and beer and beer snacks are first -class.If you are looking for a unique and unforgettable bar experience, I strongly recommend that you check minibase
